title: Communication
description: Define what type of email notification you wish to receive.

options.title: Receive notification emails
options.description: Receive emails when a new staff notification is posted.

options.title: Receive messages by email
options.description: Receive a email when a  team or organization member sends a message.

options.title: Get Git notifications
options.description: Receive an email notification when a Git activity such as commits or pull request creation occurs (subject to Git support feature available).

options.title: Get Laravel plug-in email notifications
options.description: Allow the Laravel plug-in to notify you when new syncs are completed.

options.title: Send invoice notification
options.description: Receive en email whe a new invoice is available for downloading.

title: Security
description: Activate extra security options to improve your account security.

options.title: Allow API access
options.description: Allow or deny APi access with just one click.

title: Integration
description: Specify how your account will interact with third party systems.

options.title: Allow automatic git pull requests
options.description: Allow the system to generate periodical pull request on Git-Hub when new translations are available.

options.title: Allow automatic sync activity
options.description: Allow the Laravel plug-in to automatically sync new translation in your code with the system.
